English: Chinese set expression, typically of 4 characters, often alluding to a story or historical quotation

d.f: `一~`種~`語言~`中~`簡短~`有力~`的~`固定詞組~，`可作~`為~`句子~`的~`成分~。`形式~`不一~，`以~`四~`言~`為~`主~。`一般而言~`都~`有~`出處~`來源~，`與~`引申~`的~`比喻義~，`而~`非~`單純~`使用~`字面~`上~`意思~。`如~「`矛盾~」、「`綿裡針~」、「`勢如破竹~」、「`篳路藍縷~」`等~。

English: Chinese set expression, typically of 4 characters, often alluding to a story or historical quotation
